import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import ConnectComponent from '@/connect' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import Alert from '@/components/alert' import Loader from '@/components/loader' import { LoaderFlash } from '@/components/loader' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button/index' import { GetCampaign } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/emailCampaign' import { SendCampaign } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { campaignId: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], senderEmailId: '', replyToEmailId: '', title: '', senderName: '', sent: false, } async componentWillMount() { const { params: { campaignId }, } = this.props.match this.setState({ campaignId, }) if (!this.props.CreateCampaign.data && campaignId) { const res = await GetCampaign(campaignId) this.setState({ senderEmailId: _.get(res, 'senderEmailId', ''), replyToEmailId: _.get(res, 'replyToEmailId', ''), title: _.get(res, 'title', ''), name: _.get(res, 'name', ''), senderName: _.get(res, 'senderName', ''), scheduledTime: new Date(_.get(res, 'scheduledTime', '')), }) } } sendCampaign = async () => { const { campaignId } = this.state const response = await SendCampaign({ campaignId: parseInt(campaignId, 10) }) this.setState({ sent: true, }) } render() { const { steps, campaignId, sent, senderEmailId, replyToEmailId, name, scheduledTime, senderName, title, } = this.state const { CreateCampaign } = this.props if (CreateCampaign.loading) { return } return ( {CreateCampaign.error && Error: {CreateCampaign.error}}
Campaign Details
Edit
Campaign Name
: {name}
Campaign title
: {title}
Send TO
: {senderName}
From
: {senderEmailId}
Reply TO
: {replyToEmailId}
Scheduling
Edit
Schedule Time
{scheduledTime && (
: {scheduledTime.toDateString()}, {scheduledTime.toTimeString()}{' '}
)}
Segmentation
Edit
Schedule Time
{scheduledTime && (
: {scheduledTime.toDateString()}, {scheduledTime.toTimeString()}{' '}
)}
Send Test Notification
Send Save as Draft {sent && } ) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepFive)
